answerText: "Guantanamera"[10] "Guantanamera" was adapted from a poem written by this iconic Cuban poet and freedom figher as part of his Versos Sencillos.
heading: Western Invitational Tournament |2013 | Alabama + Georgia Tech+ WUStL | 8 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The speaker of this song refers to his verse as a "wounded stag who seeks refuge on the mountain". For 10 points each: [10] Name this song, penned in Spanish by Julián Orbón, whose narrator claims to be from "where the palm tree grows".
